Producer: Niccolo De La Fere, Joshua Dixon, Louis Mandylor, H. Chung, Andrew Millet, Adam Pray
Synopsis: In the heart of Bangkok, a seasoned hitman on the cusp of retirement finds himself pulled back into the deadly world he's yearning to leave behind. Reluctantly accepting a final assignment, he believes it to be a routine job. However, as the intricacies of the mission unravel, he is plunged into a whirlwind of intrigue, danger, and unexpected alliances, causing his last endeavor to spiral into a treacherous odyssey that challenges his skills, convictions, and the limits of his own morality.
Title: Hellhound
